Literature.Title: The Analogs of Temporin-GHa Exhibit a Broader Spectrum of Antimicrobial Activity and a Stronger Antibiofilm Potential Against Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Xie Z, Wei H, Meng J, Cheng T, Song Y, Wang M, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=26 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=69 µM
